com.javadoq.html
Class DoqHTMLAllFiles

java.lang.Object
  com.javadoq.html.Doq
      com.javadoq.html.DoqHTMLFile
          com.javadoq.html.DoqHTMLBody
              com.javadoq.html.DoqHTMLAllFiles

public class DoqHTMLAllFiles
extends DoqHTMLBody

Creates "allfiles.html" file.

Note that a transformer of this type needs to close to close its opened target HTML file.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.javadoq.com

Constructor Detail

DoqHTMLAllFiles

public DoqHTMLAllFiles(JavaDoq jdoq)

Constructs a DoqHTMLAllFiles transformer.

This constructor invokes its super constructor to create and open the target file and HTML body.

Parameters:
jdoq - The JavaDoq environment for the transformer.
